short_summary: cationAviation Replacement Parts for CC-138 Twin Otter
description: Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP)", the Department of National Defence is seeking to acquire 4 items for the CC-138 Twin Otter through a Request for Proposal (RFP).",
full_summary:
### Aviation Replacement Parts for CC-138 Twin Otter

#### Contracting Agency

* Department of National Defence
* Address: 455 Boul de la Carrière, Gatineau, Quebec J8Y 6V7

#### Contracting Office

* Ivan Khanzadeev
* Contact email: [Ivan.Khanzadeev@forces.gc.ca](mailto:Ivan.Khanzadeev@forces.gc.ca)
* Contact phone: 819-939-6082

#### Requirement Summary

The **Department of National Defence** invites proposals from qualified suppliers to acquire aviation replacement parts for the CC-138 Twin Otter, under [Supply Arrangement W8485-184741 Series](https://getedsourcing.tc.gov.ca/OA_HTML/ibeRRQueSRvSR.do?begidx=0&endidx=-1&formrnntr=0000&x=63&y=4). 

The solicitation number is **W8485-258184/A** and is open only to Qualified Legal Entities who are holders of the specified Supply Arrangement.

#### Description

The Canadian Department of National Defence requires the procurement of 4 items for the CC-138 Twin Otter aircraft for the Directorate of Aerospace Procurement (DAP) 4.

#### Invitation to Bid

Government Electronics Tendering System (GETS) is not responsible for the distribution of the Request for Proposal (RFP) documents. RFP documents will be sent directly by the Contracting officer to the qualified holders of the Supply Arrangement.

#### Contact Information

* Ivan Khanzadeev
	+ Email: [Ivan.Khanzadeev@forces.gc.ca](mailto:Ivan.Khanzadeev@forces.gc.ca)
	+ Phone: 819-939-6082

#### Current Opportunity Status

The current status of this bid opportunity is "Expired". The expected contract start date is June 28, 2024, and the expected contract end date is July 12, 2024.

#### Additional Information

* Region of Opportunity: National Capital Region (NCR)
* Region of delivery: Edmonton
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

This tender notice is relevant to the following categories:

* Military Transport Aircraft
* Procurement Category: GD 
* Procurement method: Competitive – Traditional

Note that this is an archived version of the notice, as stated in the Contact Information below.

#### Archived Notice

Note that a notice will be posted periodically
